scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d database
scripts.db:status: docker compose exec database psql -U matcha_user -d matcha -c 'SELECT * FROM schema_migrations ORDER BY applied_at;'
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose exec database psql -U matcha_user -d matcha -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init.sql
scripts.db:seed: docker compose exec database psql -U matcha_user -d matcha -f /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/seeds/development_seeds.sql
